General.Name: Shanghai Highly Group Co Ltd A
General.Description: Shanghai Highly (Group) Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells components for white goods and energy vehicles in China and internationally. The company provides compressors for household AC, light commercial AC, and home appliances with heating and cooling functions; refrigeration motors for AC and refrigerator compressors; and refrigeration castings and forgings for internal compressor castings and forgings. It also offers equipment thermal management for high temperature equipment and environment; freezer and cold storage solutions for supermarkets and cold chain warehouses; and heat pump systems for indoor and building heating. In addition, the company provides automotive AC systems and energy vehicle thermal management systems for fuel and new energy vehicles; energy vehicle AC electric compressors for energy passenger cars, commercial vehicles, and buses; vehicle and cold chain compressors for parking AC, RV AC, refrigerated truck units, bus battery thermal management, and automotive refrigerators; and automobile castings and forgings for transmission, AC, steering, and braking systems. Shanghai Highly (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: No. 888 Ning Qiao Road, Shanghai, China, 201206
